tool_description: API về hoa quả, trái cây
title: Fruit_API

api_list.name: Get Fruits
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fruit_api.p.rapidapi.com/api/fruits"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fruit_api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
